channel.title: Social networks on MST Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Social networks on MST Lab

item.title: Eurodeer XI
item.description: Eurodeer is a scientific network for data and knowledge sharing on wild roe deer populations. I was honoured to give a keynote talk on Social Network Analysis to a group of conservation biologists and others working in the area of monitoring and researching wild animal movements. People from 33 different research centres and environmental institutes come together once a year to work on projects (“pagers”) and to establish data sharing mechanisms and write papers.
